import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, MDBInputGroup, MDBInput, } from "mdbreact"; import { MDBCarousel, MDBCarouselInner, MDBCarouselItem, MDBView, } from "mdbreact"; import { addAideToDB } from "..../actions/aideActionCreator"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; class Postuler extends Component { state = { modal14: false, }; toggle = (nr) => () => { let modalNumber = "modal" + nr; this.setState({ [modalNumber]: !this.state[modalNumber], }); }; render() { return ( {/* **********modal********** */} Postuler maintenant MDBModal title this.setState({ title: e.target.value })} label="Nom Prénom" outline /> this.setState({ image: e.target.value })} label="Age" outline /> this.setState({ prix: e.target.value })} label="Photo" outline /> } /> this.setState({ description: e.target.value })} label="Numéro téléphone" outline /> Close this.props.addAide({ title: this.state.title, image: this.state.image, prix: this.state.prix, description: this.state.title, }) } > Postuler {/*************** **** card ****************/}

Card Flip with Text

Hover over the image below:

kkk

John Doe

Architect & Engineer

We love that guy

 ); } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { addAide: (el) => dispatch(addAideToDB(el)), }; }; export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(Postuler);
